result.reason: This is a significant new feature (per-folder password protection) that requires deep architectural changes to the connection tree, encryption layer, and UI — scope is too large and complex for the current roadmap, and the issue has been open since 2019 with no upstream traction.
result.approach: Would require adding per-folder encryption keys, password prompt on expand, and serialization support — out of scope for fork maintenance focus
